actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the excise tax on trucks and tractors and parts and accessories for such vehicles.
short_title: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1979

summary.text: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the excise tax on the sale of trucks, tractors, and parts and accessories for such vehicles. Permits the refund or crediting of taxes paid by the manufacturer, producer, or importer on items sold after January 1, 1979.

titles.title: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the excise tax on trucks and tractors and parts and accessories for such vehicles.
